00082 namespace srm
00083 {
00090 class EXPORT_SRM_CPP_DLL SRF_LocalSpaceAzimuthal: public BaseSRF_2D
00091 {
00092 public:
00096     static SRF_LocalSpaceAzimuthal* create( SRM_ORM_Code orm,
00097                                             SRM_RT_Code  rt );
00098 
00102     static SRF_LocalSpaceAzimuthal* create( SRM_SRF_Parameters_Info srf_params )
00103     {
00104         return create( srf_params.value.srf_template.orm_code, srf_params.rt_code );
00105     }
00106 
00109     Coord2D* createCoordinate2D(SRM_Long_Float coord_comp1,
00110                                 SRM_Long_Float coord_comp2 );
00111 
00114     virtual bool isA( SRF_ClassType type ) const;
00115 
00118     virtual SRF_ClassType getClassType() const
00119     {
00120         return BaseSRF::SRF_TYP_LSA;
00121     }
00122 
00126     bool isEqual( const SRF_LocalSpaceAzimuthal &srf ) const;
00127 
00131     bool operator==( const SRF_LocalSpaceAzimuthal &rhs ) const;
00132 
00136     SRF_LocalSpaceAzimuthal* makeCopy() const;
00137 
00141     const char* toString();
00142 
00143 protected:
00144     SRF_LocalSpaceAzimuthal( void *impl ) : BaseSRF_2D(impl) {} 
00145     SRF_LocalSpaceAzimuthal &operator =( const SRF_LocalSpaceAzimuthal & ) { return *this; } 
00146     virtual ~SRF_LocalSpaceAzimuthal() {} 
00147 };

00150 inline bool SRF_LocalSpaceAzimuthal::isA( SRF_ClassType type ) const
00151 {
00152     if (type == BaseSRF::SRF_TYP_LSA)
00153         return true;
00154     else
00155         return BaseSRF_2D::isA(type);
00156 };

00160 typedef SRF_LocalSpaceAzimuthal SRF_LSA;
00161 
00162 
00167 class EXPORT_SRM_CPP_DLL Coord2D_LocalSpaceAzimuthal: public Coord2D
00168 {
00169 public:
00172     Coord2D_LocalSpaceAzimuthal( SRF_LocalSpaceAzimuthal *srf,
00173                                  SRM_Long_Float azimuth = 0.0,
00174                                  SRM_Long_Float radius = 0.0 )
00175     : Coord2D(srf)
00176     {
00177         setComponentValues(azimuth, radius);
00178     }
00179 
00182     Coord2D_LocalSpaceAzimuthal( const Coord2D_LocalSpaceAzimuthal &coord )
00183     : Coord2D(coord._srf)
00184     {
00185         setComponentValues( coord._values[0], coord._values[1] );
00186     }
00187 
00193     void copyTo( Coord2D_LocalSpaceAzimuthal &coord ) const
00194     {
00195         if (coord._srf != _srf)
00196             throw Exception( SRM_STATCOD_INVALID_SOURCE_COORDINATE, "copyTo: Coordinate associated with a difference SRF" );
00197 
00198         coord._values[0] = _values[0];
00199         coord._values[1] = _values[1];
00200     }
00201 
00205     bool isEqual( const Coord2D_LocalSpaceAzimuthal &coord ) const
00206     {
00207         return (_srf == coord._srf &&
00208                 _values[0] == coord._values[0] &&
00209                 _values[1] == coord._values[1] );
00210     }
00211 
00214     void setComponentValues( SRM_Long_Float azimuth, SRM_Long_Float radius )
00215     {
00216         _values[0] = azimuth;
00217         _values[1] = radius;
00218     }
00219 
00222     SRM_Long_Float get_azimuth() const
00223     {
00224         return _values[0];
00225     }
00226 
00229     SRM_Long_Float get_radius() const
00230     {
00231         return _values[1];
00232     }
00233 
00236     void set_azimuth( SRM_Long_Float value )
00237     {
00238         _values[0] = value;
00239     }
00240 
00243     void set_radius( SRM_Long_Float value )
00244     {
00245         _values[1] = value;
00246     }
00247 
00250     virtual bool isA( Coord_ClassType type ) const;
00251 
00254     virtual Coord_ClassType getClassType() const
00255     {
00256         return Coord::COORD_TYP_LSA;
00257     }
00258 
00261     bool operator==( const Coord2D_LocalSpaceAzimuthal &rhs ) const;
00262 
00268     bool isCompatibleWith( const Coord2D_LocalSpaceAzimuthal &rhs ) const
00269     {
00270         return ((*(SRF_LocalSpaceAzimuthal*)(this->_srf)) == (*(SRF_LocalSpaceAzimuthal*)(rhs._srf)));
00271     }
00272 
00277     Coord2D_LocalSpaceAzimuthal &operator= ( const Coord2D_LocalSpaceAzimuthal &rhs )
00278     {
00279         if((*(SRF_LocalSpaceAzimuthal*)(this->_srf)) == (*(SRF_LocalSpaceAzimuthal*)(rhs._srf)))
00280         {
00281             _values[0] = rhs._values[0];
00282             _values[1] = rhs._values[1];
00283         }
00284         else
00285             throw Exception(SRM_STATCOD_INVALID_TARGET_COORDINATE,
00286                             "SRF_LocalSpaceAzimuthal op=: incompatible rhs coordinate");
00287 
00288         return *this;
00289     }
00290 };
00291 
00292 
00293 inline bool Coord2D_LocalSpaceAzimuthal::isA( Coord_ClassType type ) const
00294 {
00295     if (type == Coord::COORD_TYP_LSA)
00296         return true;
00297     else
00298         return Coord2D::isA(type);
00299 };
